Uses of Package
org.jsimpledb.kv.mvcc

  • Packages that use org.jsimpledb.kv.mvcc 
    Package Description
    org.jsimpledb.kv.leveldb
    KVDatabase implementation based on LevelDB.
    org.jsimpledb.kv.mvcc
    Utility classes for MVCC type operations using a KVStore.
    org.jsimpledb.kv.raft
    A distributed KVDatabase based on the Raft consensus algorithm.
    org.jsimpledb.kv.raft.msg
    Raft inter-node messages.
    org.jsimpledb.util
    General utility classes used with JSimpleDB.
  • Classes in org.jsimpledb.kv.mvcc used by org.jsimpledb.kv.leveldb 
    Class and Description
    AtomicKVStore
    Extension of the KVStore interface for implementations that support atomic, batched reads and writes.
    Mutations
    Represents a set of mutations that can be applied to a KVStore.
    SnapshotKVDatabase
    KVDatabase implementation based on an underlying AtomicKVStore that uses snapshot views and optimistic locking to provide concurrent transactions and linearizable ACID consistency.
    SnapshotKVTransaction
    SnapshotKVDatabase transaction.
    SnapshotVersion
    Represents one SnapshotKVDatabase MVCC version.
  • Classes in org.jsimpledb.kv.mvcc used by org.jsimpledb.kv.mvcc 
    Class and Description
    AtomicKVStore
    Extension of the KVStore interface for implementations that support atomic, batched reads and writes.
    LockManager.LockResult
    Possible return values from LockManager.lock().
    LockOwner
    Represents the owner of a Lock managed by a LockManager.
    MutableView
    Provides a mutable view of an underlying, read-only KVStore.
    Mutations
    Represents a set of mutations that can be applied to a KVStore.
    Reads
    Holds a set of reads from a KVStore.
    SnapshotKVDatabase
    KVDatabase implementation based on an underlying AtomicKVStore that uses snapshot views and optimistic locking to provide concurrent transactions and linearizable ACID consistency.
    SnapshotKVTransaction
    SnapshotKVDatabase transaction.
    SnapshotVersion
    Represents one SnapshotKVDatabase MVCC version.
    Writes
    Holds a set of writes to a KVStore.
  • Classes in org.jsimpledb.kv.mvcc used by org.jsimpledb.kv.raft 
    Class and Description
    AtomicKVStore
    Extension of the KVStore interface for implementations that support atomic, batched reads and writes.
  • Classes in org.jsimpledb.kv.mvcc used by org.jsimpledb.kv.raft.msg 
    Class and Description
    Reads
    Holds a set of reads from a KVStore.
    Writes
